website_summaries.verdict: An impressive-looking model kit that is a simple build without the need for any glue or paint.
pros: Die cast metal body plates make the model extremely durable and long lasting
Panels come prepainted and assemble together with the plastic parts without the need for any glue
cons: A few parts may be mismatched or may require some slight alterations to fit accurately

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, fun to do.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned after reading some reviews stating that it was difficult to put together. My 9 year old son wanted the green Lamborghini model. Once it came, he put it all together in less than a half hour. He did not have any issues. Nothing broke, and assembly wasn't confusing. My son is not a brainiac, so I feel that this model car would be just fine- even for children- to put together. My son really enjoyed this! I highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a younger engineer, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality, looks great. Purchased for my 11 year old son, who loves cars and loves to build things. His brother (13) jumped in to help build, and it only took them about 20 minutes. I'll probably buy something more advanced next time, to give him more of a challenge on the assembly, but this is a nice car!
customer_reviews.author: H. D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fun kits for ages 6 and 9 with grownup help
customer_reviews.text: These are a hit with my 9 and 6 year old boys. We sat down and unboxed two different versions at the same time. Within 45 minutes both were built with some adult help but little to no frustration. I can’t give them 5 stars because the instructions could be easier to follow and, as mentioned by others, there is a bit of misalignment that does affect functioning in the end so not perfect but very good. The cars are are sturdy and can definitely be played with after building. My boys also liked that they came with wheel trim options.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, not worth the $, not giftable DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my nephew who lives 500 miles away and I'm seeing for our yearly birthday visit tomorrow. I ordered this car because it looked so cool and I'm furious that the box is completely damaged. It's not damaged from the delivery process because that box was perfectly intact. I'm embarrassed to give this to him tomorrow but I have no time to exchange or return before we travel tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Jefcoat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit and Finish for a Lamborghini Model
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 12 year old grandson. He loves Lamborghini cars! His Mother confirmed that model was broken when it arrived and had visible paint defects in the body. We won't let me return the car. Advise caution on buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great product line! Very easy for a ten year old to do on his own and very easy to put together. Comes with a set of directions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 8yr old
customer_reviews.text: Our 8yr old loves it. He assembled it over about 30minutea and still plays with it weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Bak

customer_reviews.title: More than a toy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good value and fun to assemble. Paint is flawless and has good detail. I use it for display. Shows well alongside cars costing many times more. Of course under close inspection it cannot compete with the extreme detail of an Autoart or CMC, but from any distance it looks great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: john damkier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car kit!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves cars. I thought it would be great to get him a car that he could build (he also loves STEM) himself. The kit was great, very easy to assemble and is very sturdy. If you have, or are, a car fanatic- we would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Overall Everything is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great. Very solid construction. Color is amazing. Pretty easy to put together. Only Issue I had, was that one of the doors was just a little bit loose on arrival. Not sure why, but I couldn't tighten it up. That's it though. Would buy again, and would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hines

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with my ten year old
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to put together with my ten year old. Only negative I'd put is that it was too quick to put together. But it is a snap model, so can't discredit the product for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I didnt listen to negative reviews!! The product comes with picture instructions and is easy to assemble. Great for my10 year olds first time putting the car together. He is so proud of his car!! I am please with this purchased. Good material great looking car!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria W

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Adult had to do most of it, not the 9 year old - it was too frustrating. But the finished product is great!
customer_reviews.author: ConradColeridge

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and durable
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old put almost the whole thing together and absolutely loves it!!! Seems pretty durable, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice gift to buy for a 10 year old boy. Our grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: csb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson put this car together on his own on Christmas evening. It looks fantastic and he loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great model
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my 11yr old. He was able to get it together all my himself and he a absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Roark

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year-old loved it! Good quality for the price and has been very durable
customer_reviews.author: ewhite

customer_reviews.title: Nice final product
customer_reviews.text: Took just enough time to assemble and keep my 12 year olds attention
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Butler

customer_reviews.title: ... we get a black or purple one would be better.
customer_reviews.text: If we get a black or purple one would be better.
customer_reviews.author: nicole b.

customer_reviews.title: Idk nothing  about it my son does it's a present for him
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was gonna be a paint kit for son hope he still likes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No reason not to buy if you like models
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, and heavy metal, definitely a great model and gift recommend for sure
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Mini mechanics start here
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these kits. They are more models than they are toys however so they take a beating in the form of mirrors and axels breaking
customer_reviews.author: Wkeats

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit quite right.
customer_reviews.text: All of the pieces did not fit quite right. My son had to hand craft some adjustments. Once put together it was a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Dunston

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this & another model car as a gift for my grandson. He loved putting this together & loved the looks. Likes to put on shelf to display.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elbert

customer_reviews.title: Maisto should't false advertise like that. Besides that the car looks good
customer_reviews.text: The product does not actually have "working steering". What i got is a fixed chassis with no left or right steering. Maisto should't false advertise like that. Besides that the car looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My son liked it alot. Good size, good details. Dash and rear view mirror were a little tricky to install. Would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Charles Wiedefeld

customer_reviews.title: Best Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson's birthday. I believe his first word was Awesome! He asked if maybe he could get another one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Steel Frame Die Cast Lambo
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping. Nice Steel Frame Die Cast Lambo. My son Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment. Easy to assemble. Jeffrey Epstein didn’t kill himself
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Easy to put together. Jeffrey Epstein didn’t kill himself
customer_reviews.author: chris dunn

customer_reviews.title: I am sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a Grandson, I am sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Harper

customer_reviews.title: He loved it though
customer_reviews.text: Not challenging enough for my 8 yr old. He loved it though. Put it together in 10 min
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy for my son to put together
customer_reviews.author: 2smart4u

customer_reviews.title: Only okay
customer_reviews.text: This car was fairly simple to put together but it kind of looks cheap and feels cheap as well. I wouldn't purchase it again but it was easy for my 11 year old to assemble and looks decent from a distance on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Cathlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for his birthday-He LOVED it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Marks

customer_reviews.title: good buiild wiith my 8 year old Nephew.
customer_reviews.text: bought it to build something with one of my nephews, he is still in Legos and I want us to move to more complex stuff. this was a one nighter for me and my 8 yo nephew. Fun to build, a few rough areas, never got the rear view mirror in. Not 4 yo proof he took days if not hours to break it. He will be building with us soon, and will break less then. It was fun for my and the 8 yo to build.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very enjoyable for my first model kit and the shade of green is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but some of the pieces didn't fit because of the pre paint job. i filed down some space for the rearview mirror and then the doors have a bit of problem opening, you'll want to find something that works for you so you can have full Range of motion for the doors. looks pretty cool when assembled, I just thought this was a more in depth model and I was certianly wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Voiers

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy !
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Was durable, working doors and hood. Easy assembly and my grandson loved it. Would definitely buy more as he loves Lamborghini's.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: Great car for my 9 yr old son. He loved being able to put it together himself, and it looks like a prebuilt diecast when its done.
customer_reviews.author: RosalindRN

customer_reviews.title: Maker's satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, she loved it. According to her, the assembly experience was the best part
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Simple Designs LT2013-WHT Sand Nickel Mini Basic Table Lamp with Fabric Shade, White
customer_reviews.text: worst thing I have ever bought, Simple Designs LT2013-WHT Sand Nickel Mini Basic Table Lamp with Fabric Shade, White . every light bulbs I put in the lamp breaks, probably will not buy from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carver

customer_reviews.title: short lived project
customer_reviews.text: These are cool, but they literally took my 8 and 10 year old about 5 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your little builder
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift! Nephew enjoyed putting this together. I wish this company made more
customer_reviews.author: Allina A. Nocon

customer_reviews.title: Fair enough for the money
customer_reviews.text: The little car won't open the hoods and it doesn't have a suspension. I saw better quality in the past but not anymore right now. My kid still happy enough anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

product_meta.title: Maisto Assembly Line Lamborghini Aventador Roadster Die Cast Model Kit (1:24 Scale)
product_meta.description: Building models is a great hobby. Not only is it fun but you can learn about real vehicles by examining the individual parts as you put them together. All Maisto Assembly Line kits are already painted and do not require any glue. The parts snap together or are attached with fasteners using the assembly tool included in each kit.
feature_bullets: Die-cast metal body with plastic parts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
